quote: So, look, when President Obama was there two weeks ago making a speech, very nice speech. Two people were shot and killed during his speech. You can't have that.
quotePlain: So, look, when President Obama was there two weeks ago making a speech, very nice speech. Two people were shot and killed during his speech. You can’t have that.
name: Donald Trump
where: interview with ABC News' David Muir

checks.short: There were no gun homicide victims in Chicago that day.
checks.shortPlain: There were no gun homicide victims in Chicago that day.

checks.quote: Not only did no homicides take place in Chicago during Obama's address of about an hour Jan. 10, but the official Police Department records and the Tribune's crime database show that no shootings at all occurred over that time frame.
checks.quotePlain: Not only did no homicides take place in Chicago during Obama’s address of about an hour Jan. 10, but the official Police Department records and the Tribune’s crime database show that no shootings at all occurred over that time frame.

checks.quote: Chicago police records show no one was fatally shot in the city on Jan. 10, the day of Obama’s speech. There were five shootings, but none occurred while Obama was speaking.
checks.quotePlain: Chicago police records show no one was fatally shot in the city on Jan. 10, the day of Obama’s speech. There were five shootings, but none occurred while Obama was speaking.

claims.title: two people were killed during an Obama speech
claims.negative: nobody was killed during an Obama speech
claims.negativePlain: nobody was killed during an Obama speech
claims.truth: There were no gun homicide victims in Chicago that day.
claims.truthPlain: There were no gun homicide victims in Chicago that day.
